overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by a six-month physical presence test.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Certain income types may be tax-free, such as gifts and inheritances.

corporate_tax.deductions: R&D expenses, depreciation, and other business expenses.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of personal property are generally tax-free.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 12% on food and beverages in restaurants.

inheritance_tax.exemptions: Inheritances from parents to children are tax-free.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Proof of income and health insurance.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Standard income and capital gains tax rates apply.

special_economic_zones.name: Gotland
special_economic_zones.setup_requirements: Registration with the Swedish Companies Registration Office.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Treated as personal income and taxed at marginal rates.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Treated as capital gains and taxed at 30%.
crypto_tax.mining_tax: Treated as business income and taxed at 20%.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Treated as personal income and taxed at marginal rates.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Treated as capital gains and taxed at 30%.

additional_notes.political_risks: Sweden has a stable political and economic environment.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Sweden has a strong and stable economy.
additional_notes.legal_system: Sweden has a well-established and efficient legal system.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 7th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
